translations: n．男孩们，小伙子们：laddie的复数形式，是lad的亲切说法，表示年轻男子或男孩。
· The laddies were playing soccer in the park.
那些小伙子们在公园里踢足球。

sentences.sentence: Hot springs water adds the glutinous rice long steam send forth the subtle fragrance, pure heat stop bleeding keep facial appearance beauty. Laddies still love it.
sentences.translation: 千年温泉水将糯米久蒸，沾茯清香。可清热止血，美容养颜，女士犹爱之。

sentences.sentence: Reply to the Laddies: This is occasionally (and humorously) called the "toast to the Laddies" and, like the previous toast, it is generally quite wide-ranging nowadays.
sentences.translation: 回应男士们：这个环节又(幽默地)称作“为男士举杯”，跟之前的敬酒词一样，现在一般都说的比较广泛。
